view_id.description: A unique identifier of the view to be updated. Either `view_id` or `external_id` is required.

external_id.description: A unique identifier of the view set by the developer. Must be unique for all views on a team. Max length of 255 characters. Either `view_id` or `external_id` is required.

view.description: A [view object](/reference/surfaces/views). This must be a JSON-encoded string.

hash.description: A string that represents view state to protect against possible race conditions.

$block: This method either only returns a brief _OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
This method either only returns a brief _not OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
